title: The Power Rule
speech: If  f of x is equal to, x to the n-th , then  f prime, of x is equal to, n x raised to the n minus 1 power .

title: Application of Power Rule $$1$$
text: To get the derivative of $$x^7$$, we multiply our constant (1) by our exponent (7) and subtract the exponent power by $$1$$.

title: The Constant Rule
text: If f(x) is a constant c, $$f'(x)=0$$.
speech: If f(x) is a constant c, , f prime, of x, is equal to 0 .
pacedSpeech: If f(x) is a constant c,  , f prime, of x, is equal to 0

title: The Sum Rule $$1$$
text: The derivative of the sum of a function f and a function g is the same as the sum of the derivative of f and the derivative of g.
speech: The derivative of the sum of a function f and a function g is the same as the sum of the derivative of f and the derivative of g.
pacedSpeech: The derivative of the sum of a function f and a function g is the same as the sum of the derivative of f and the derivative of g.

title: The Sum Rule $$2$$
text: You can add the two separate derivatives that we just found to find our answer.
